TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE , GPE . He is represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE .

Following the submission of his tax declaration for DATE investigations were carried out by the tax authorities in respect of certain income allegedly obtained in GPE at a time when the applicant also obtained unemployment benefits in GPE . It appears that the police were informed of the situation on DATE whereas it does not appear from the file whether or to what extent the applicant was aware of any police investigations at that moment in time . In DATE it appears that the applicant was questioned by the police about his alleged employment by a NORP company in DATE .

By indictment of DATE ( amended on DATE ) the applicant was charged with fraud , pursuant to LAW ( straffeloven ) , for having wrongfully informed ORG ( NORP Arbejdsløshedskasse ) that he was unemployed in the period from DATE until DATE although he was in fact employed in GPE , thereby causing ORG a loss in the amount of MONEY ( ORG ) . He was also charged with tax evasion , pursuant to LAW , subsection CARDINAL , of LAW ( GPE ) , for not having informed GPE ( ORG ) of income obtained in GPE in DATE , thereby causing the tax authorities a loss in the amount of CARDINAL ORG . Finally , he was charged with theft pursuant to LAW for having stolen CARDINAL plastic bags containing items with an assessed value totalling CARDINAL DKK . The latter charge concerned an offence allegedly committed in DATE .

On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant requested the Chief of Police of Gentofte ( GPE i ORG ) to undertake certain investigatory measures relating to his alleged contract of employment with the company in GPE . The Chief of Police replied on DATE . On DATE the applicant maintained that further investigations were necessary whereas it appears that the police considered that the case was ready for adjudication . Therefore , on CARDINAL DATE the applicant requested ORG ( PERSON ) to request the NORP authorities to assist in clarifying whether any evidence existed that could substantiate the prosecution ’s allegation that the applicant had been working in GPE during the period in question . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the Chief of Police submitted to the court that he found the requested measures to be without relevance to the case . It appears that a court session was held on DATE following which the applicant requested an adjournment in order to have certain factual points clarified . The applicant submitted further requests for investigations by letter of CARDINAL DATE .

The trial subsequently commenced in ORG . The applicant , represented by counsel , and CARDINAL witnesses , including the witnesses PERSON and PERSON , were heard . Following an evaluation of the available evidence ORG found the applicant guilty of the charges brought against him and by judgment of DATE he was sentenced to CARDINAL months’ imprisonment and a fine in the amount of CARDINAL ORG . The prison sentence was suspended on the condition that no further criminal act would be committed by the applicant within DATE from delivery of judgment . The applicant was ordered to bear the costs of the case amounting to CARDINAL ORG .

The applicant as well as the prosecution appealed against the judgment to ORG of Eastern GPE ( PERSON ) . During the proceedings before ORG it appears that the applicant raised the issue of further investigative measures to be taken by the police .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant submitted , inter alia , that a request be made to ORG for a preliminary ruling pursuant to LAW . ORG Statsadvokaten for Sjælland

On DATE the applicant requested ORG for leave to appeal against ORG decision to ORG ( Højesteret ) . On DATE the prosecutor submitted the file and his observations to the Ministry . On DATE the applicant submitted his observations and requested that the examination of his request for leave to appeal be adjourned until he had obtained a statement from an expert in Community Law .

On DATE the ORG fixed a time - limit of DATE for the applicant ’s final observations . On DATE the applicant requested an extension of the time - limit in order to obtain the NORP copy of a judgment from ORG . Accordingly , on DATE the ORG fixed a time - limit of DATE for the applicant ’s final observations . On DATE the applicant submitted his observations , inter alia , referring to a judgment pronounced by ORG on DATE . On DATE the ORG requested the prosecutor to comment on the applicant ’s submissions . On DATE the prosecutor ’s comments were sent to the applicant who replied on DATE . The applicant submitted additional comments on DATE .
On DATE , on the basis of the above - mentioned observations , the ORG rejected his request for leave to appeal against the decision of ORG of DATE .

Thereafter the criminal case against the applicant continued in ORG . On DATE and DATE the applicant requested ORG to hear a number of witnesses , including GPE and PERSON On DATE ORG allowed the hearing of GPE and PERSON but dismissed the other evidence proposed as it found that this evidence was of no relevance for the determination of the case . The applicant applied for leave to appeal against this decision . However , on DATE ORG ( Procesbevillingsnævnet ) rejected the applicant ’s request .

The criminal case was subsequently heard in ORG . The applicant and CARDINAL witnesses , including PERSON and PERSON , were heard . On the basis of the evidence presented ORG upheld ORG of Gentofte ’s judgment on DATE . The applicant was ordered to bear the costs of the case before ORG amounting to CARDINAL ORG , including CARDINAL DKK in counsel ’s fees .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s request for leave to appeal against ORG judgment to ORG .
